summary.what: Centralize config dir with cross-platform support, document configuration in README
summary.why: Config path was hardcoded as ~/.config/timbers in two places (env loader, template resolver). Windows users would get the wrong path. Also, README had no documentation of config strategy, API keys, or custom templates — users had to discover these by reading source.
summary.how: New internal/config package with Dir() function: checks TIMBERS_CONFIG_HOME, XDG_CONFIG_HOME, Windows AppData, then falls back to ~/.config/timbers. Both env loader and template resolver now use config.Dir(). README gains Configuration section covering env file resolution, API key setup, and custom template creation.
